PHRASE.LANG: 凶悪なコウモリ？が飛び出してフンを落とした瞬間を再現した帽子。なぜか段ボール製である。[#Legal]
A hat depicting the moment an “evil bat”? pops out and drops guano. For some reason it's made out of cardboard.[#Legal]

흉악한 박쥐?가 튀어나와 배설물을 떨어뜨리는 순간을 재현한 모자. 왜인지 골판지로 만들어져 있다. [#Legal]
A hat depicting the moment an “evil bat”? pops out and drops guano. For some reason it's made out of cardboard.[#Legal]
